Home.title: RKS Machinery Pvt Ltd.
Home.landing-heading: Laboratory Equipment solution based in Nepal.
Home.landing-subheading: We are working at the intersection of innovation and  education. It's a really busy intersection though — a lot of our staff have been involved in demonstration and training.
Home.client-heading: We've worked with hundreds of amazing people

Products.heading: Products
Products.sub-heading: We provide all kinds of laboratory equipment, chemicals, glassware and consumables for schools, colleges, universities and other research centers.

Testimonial.content: The team at RKSM went above and beyond with our onboarding, even helping us setting up the Laboratory machines as well as gave training on how to use and maintain them.

Services.title: Services
Services.heading: We help you identify, explore and respond to new opportunities.
Services.sub-heading: As long as those opportunities involve giving us money to re-purpose old projects — we can come up with an endless number of those.

service-1.heading: Laboratory Equipment
service-1.content: We provide all kinds of laboratory equipment and machines for schools, colleges, universities and other research centers.

service-2.heading: Laboratory Chemicals
service-2.content: We provide all kinds of laboratory chemicals for schools, colleges, universities and other research centers.

service-3.heading: Laboratory Glassware
service-3.content: We provide all kinds of laboratory glassware for schools, colleges, universities and other research centers.

service-4.heading: Laboratory Consumables
service-4.content: We provide all kinds of laboratory consumables for schools, colleges, universities and other research centers.
